commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basf482d849"

diff:
"f482d849 Bug 394535 - "Remove obsolete code from PNG decoder" [p=glennrp@gmail.com (Glenn Randers-Pehrson) r+sr+a1.9=tor]
diff --git a/modules/libpr0n/decoders/png/nsPNGDecoder.cpp b/modules/libpr0n/decoders/png/nsPNGDecoder.cpp
index 59b8142..f1b776e 100644
--- a/modules/libpr0n/decoders/png/nsPNGDecoder.cpp
+++ b/modules/libpr0n/decoders/png/nsPNGDecoder.cpp
@@ -796,8 +796,5 @@ error_callback(png_structp png_ptr, png_const_charp error_msg)
 void
 warning_callback(png_structp png_ptr, png_const_charp warning_msg)
 {
-  /* convert tRNS warning to error (bug #251381) */
-  if (strncmp(warning_msg, "Missing PLTE before tRNS", 24) == 0)
-    png_error(png_ptr, warning_msg);
   PR_LOG(gPNGLog, PR_LOG_WARNING, ("libpng warning: %s\n", warning_msg));
 }
"
